messages.messageBody:
Ah, you should see it in person!

It's a warm and sincere grin, and only slightly mischievous around the edges...

<g>
Helen

Sandra slightly mischevious??? Love it.
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!

messages.messageBody:
At 3:55 PM -0700 5/23/01, Sharon Rudd wrote:
> Your smile in
>your picture on your web-site is positively
>breathtaking. That grin says so much about who you
>are!

Ah, you should see it in person!

It's a warm and sincere grin, and only slightly mischievous around the edges...

<g>
Helen

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] and worse? not so bad, really
messages.msgSnippet: I must have deleted the post that Cindy is responding to, I deleted a bunch without reading them......I must have deleted the post that Sandra was responding
messages.messageBody:
I must have deleted the post that Cindy is responding
to, I deleted a bunch without reading them......I must
have deleted the post that Sandra was responding to,
too,thank goodness! But I think we all agree with
Cindy. Please don't feel bad, Sandra. Your smile in
your picture on your web-site is positively
breathtaking. That grin says so much about who you
are!
Sharon

--- Cindy Ferguson <crma@...> wrote:
>

> I won't state this in private - I will state it
> publically. I DO NOT
> think you, Sandra, are evil. I have learned a lot
> from your posts and
> even when I don't agree with them, I find them
> thought-provoking. I
> consider Sandra to be a very valuable member of this
> on-line community.
>
> --

> Cindy Ferguson
